scenario_text.value: There! There’s something in the water!
Really? Where? I don’t see a thing.

I’m sure I saw something! Maybe it’s hard for
humans to see? My nose says it’s important!

(Humans can’t see it... Oh, I know. I’ll try
<color=#B41919>looking with my camera</color>.)

It may be related to Shuuji somehow. Maybe
you can check in the water?
